@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

:: --- é…ç½®åŒºåŸŸ ---
set "SYNC_USER1=admin:1234"    :: æ ¼å¼: â€œç”¨æˆ·å:å¯†ç â€
set "SYNC_HOST="                   :: æœåŠ¡å™¨å±€åŸŸç½‘IPï¼Œç•™ç©ºåˆ™ç»‘å®šæ‰€æœ‰æ¥å£
set "SYNC_PORT=8080"               :: ç›‘å¬ç«¯å£
set "SYNC_BASE=F:\SoftwareData\AnkiServer"  :: æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨ç›®å½•
set "PROCESS_NAME=python.exe"      :: è¿›ç¨‹åç§°
set "PROCESS_ARG=anki.syncserver"  :: è¿›ç¨‹ç‰¹å¾å‚æ•°

:: æ˜¾ç¤ºé…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
echo ==============================================
echo Anki åŒæ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨é…ç½®
echo ==============================================
echo ç”¨æˆ·é…ç½®:    !SYNC_USER1!
echo æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€:  !SYNC_HOST!
echo ç›‘å¬ç«¯å£:    !SYNC_PORT!
echo æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨ç›®å½•:!SYNC_BASE!
echo ==============================================

:: æ£€æµ‹æœåŠ¡å™¨çŠ¶æ€ï¼šåŒæ—¶æ£€æŸ¥ç«¯å£å’Œè¿›ç¨‹ä¿¡æ¯
set "SERVER_PID="
for /f "tokens=5" %%a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr /i ":!SYNC_PORT! LISTENING"') do (
    :: æ£€æŸ¥è¯¥PIDæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºpythonè¿›ç¨‹ä¸”åŒ…å«æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•°
    for /f "delims=" %%b in ('wmic process where "ProcessId=%%a" get CommandLine /value ^| findstr /i "!PROCESS_NAME! !PROCESS_ARG!"') do (
        set "SERVER_PID=%%a"
    )
)

:: å¦‚æœæ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„è¿›ç¨‹PID
if defined SERVER_PID (
    echo æ£€æµ‹åˆ°AnkiæœåŠ¡å™¨å·²åœ¨è¿è¡Œï¼ˆPID:!SERVER_PID!ï¼Œç«¯å£:!SYNC_PORT!ï¼‰
    echo.
    echo è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ“ä½œ:
    echo  æŒ‰ä¸‹ C é”®å¹¶å›è½¦ - å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨
    echo  æŒ‰ä¸‹å…¶ä»–é”®å¹¶å›è½¦ - å–æ¶ˆæ“ä½œ
    echo.
    
    :: è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥
    set /p "CHOICE=è¯·è¾“å…¥é€‰æ‹©: "
    
    :: åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºcæˆ–C
    if /i "!CHOICE!" equ "C" (
        echo æ­£åœ¨å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨...
        :: æ€æ­»æ‰¾åˆ°çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿›ç¨‹
        taskkill /F /PID !SERVER_PID! >nul 2>&1
        if !errorlevel! equ 0 (
            echo æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²æˆåŠŸå…³é—­ï¼ˆPID:!SERVER_PID!ï¼‰
        ) else (
            echo å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨ç»“æŸè¿›ç¨‹ï¼ˆPID:!SERVER_PID!ï¼‰
        )
    ) else (
        echo å·²å–æ¶ˆå…³é—­æ“ä½œï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ç»§ç»­è¿è¡Œ
    )
    pause
    goto end
)

:: å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼ˆæœªè¿è¡Œæ—¶ï¼‰
echo æœªæ£€æµ‹åˆ°è¿è¡Œä¸­çš„AnkiæœåŠ¡å™¨
echo æ­£åœ¨å¯åŠ¨ Anki åŒæ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨...
echo æœåŠ¡å™¨å°†åœ¨åå°è¿è¡Œï¼Œå…³é—­æ­¤çª—å£ä¸å½±å“æœåŠ¡
echo ==============================================

:: ä½¿ç”¨VBScriptåˆ›å»ºéšè—çª—å£å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨
echo Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") > temp.vbs
echo objShell.Run "cmd /c python -m anki.syncserver", 0, False >> temp.vbs
cscript //nologo temp.vbs
del temp.vbs


echo æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²åœ¨åå°å¯åŠ¨ï¼ˆç«¯å£:!SYNC_PORT!ï¼‰
echo å¯ä»¥å…³é—­æ­¤çª—å£
echo å†æ¬¡è¿è¡Œæœ¬è„šæœ¬å°†æä¾›å…³é—­é€‰é¡¹

echo 3ç§’åè‡ªåŠ¨å…³é—­æ­¤çª—å£...

:end

item.title: tesseract.JS OCR
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡OCRå·¥å…· - æç®€ç‰ˆ</title>
  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/font-awesome@4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tesseract.js@5.1.0/dist/tesseract.min.js"></script>
  <style>
    .drag-active { border-color: #10b981; background-color: #ecfdf5; }
    /* éšè—æ»šåŠ¨æ¡ä½†å…è®¸æ»šåŠ¨ */
    textarea::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 8px; }
    textarea::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: #cbd5e1; border-radius: 4px; }
  </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-slate-50 min-h-screen flex flex-col font-sans text-slate-800">

  <header class="bg-white shadow-sm py-4 px-6">
    <div class="container mx-auto flex justify-between items-center">
      <h1 class="text-xl font-bold text-slate-800"><i class="fa fa-cube text-blue-500 mr-2"></i>æœ¬åœ°OCRè¯†åˆ«</h1>
      <span class="text-xs text-slate-500 bg-slate-100 px-2 py-1 rounded">æœ¬åœ°è¿ç®— Â· ä¸ä¸Šä¼ æœåŠ¡å™¨</span>
    </div>
  </header>

  <main class="flex-grow container mx-auto py-6 px-4 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
    
    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 flex flex-col h-full">
      <h2 class="font-semibold mb-4 text-slate-700"><i class="fa fa-upload text-blue-500 mr-2"></i>ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡</h2>
      
      <div id="dropArea" class="flex-1 border-2 border-dashed border-slate-300 rounded-lg flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 transition-colors cursor-pointer min-h-[200px] relative">
        <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*" class="hidden">
        
        <div id="uploadPrompt" class="text-center">
          <i class="fa fa-cloud-upload text-4xl text-slate-300 mb-3"></i>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500">ç‚¹å‡»æˆ–æ‹–æ‹½å›¾ç‰‡è‡³æ­¤</p>
        </div>

        <img id="previewImg" class="hidden max-h-64 max-w-full object-contain rounded shadow-sm z-10">
        
        <button id="clearBtn" class="hidden absolute top-2 right-2 bg-red-500 text-white w-6 h-6 rounded-full hover:bg-red-600 z-20 items-center justify-center text-xs">
          <i class="fa fa-times"></i>
        </button>
      </div>

      <div id="progressBox" class="hidden mt-4">
        <div class="flex justify-between text-xs text-slate-500 mb-1">
          <span>æ­£åœ¨è¯†åˆ«...</span>
          <span id="progressText">0%</span>
        </div>
        <div class="h-2 bg-slate-100 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
          <div id="progressBar" class="h-full bg-blue-500 transition-all duration-300 w-0"></div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <button id="runBtn" disabled class="mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-slate-300 cursor-not-allowed transition-colors flex justify-center items-center">
        å¼€å§‹è¯†åˆ«
      </button>
    </div>

    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 flex flex-col h-full">
      <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
        <h2 class="font-semibold text-slate-700"><i class="fa fa-file-text text-emerald-500 mr-2"></i>è¯†åˆ«ç»“æœ</h2>
        <button id="copyBtn" class="text-sm text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700 disabled:text-slate-300" disabled>
          <i class="fa fa-copy mr-1"></i>å¤åˆ¶
        </button>
      </div>

      <div class="flex-grow relative bg-slate-50 rounded-lg border border-slate-200">
        <textarea id="resultBox" class="w-full h-full p-4 bg-transparent resize-none focus:outline-none text-sm leading-relaxed" 
          placeholder="ç­‰å¾…è¯†åˆ«..." readonly></textarea>
        
        <div id="toast" class="absolute bottom-4 right-4 bg-slate-800 text-white text-xs px-3 py-1.5 rounded opacity-0 transition-opacity pointer-events-none">
          å·²å¤åˆ¶
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </main>

  <script>
    // å…ƒç´ å¼•ç”¨
    const els = {
      dropArea: document.getElementById('dropArea'),
      fileInput: document.getElementById('fileInput'),
      previewImg: document.getElementById('previewImg'),
      uploadPrompt: document.getElementById('uploadPrompt'),
      clearBtn: document.getElementById('clearBtn'),
      runBtn: document.getElementById('runBtn'),
      progressBox: document.getElementById('progressBox'),
      progressBar: document.getElementById('progressBar'),
      progressText: document.getElementById('progressText'),
      resultBox: document.getElementById('resultBox'),
      copyBtn: document.getElementById('copyBtn'),
      toast: document.getElementById('toast')
    };

    let currentFile = null;

    // --- å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°ï¼šæ¸…ç†æ–‡æœ¬ç©ºæ ¼ ---
    // 1. å»é™¤ä¸­æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´çš„ç©ºæ ¼
    // 2. å°†å¤šä¸ªç©ºè¡Œåˆå¹¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ¢è¡Œ
    // 3. å»é™¤æ¯è¡Œé¦–å°¾ç©ºæ ¼
    function cleanText(text) {
      return text
        .replace(/([^\x00-\xff])\s+([^\x00-\xff])/g, '$1$2') // å»é™¤æ±‰å­—é—´ç©ºæ ¼
        .replace(/[\r\n]+/g, '\n')  // åˆå¹¶å¤šä¸ªæ¢è¡Œç¬¦
        .split('\n').map(line => line.trim()).filter(line => line.length > 0).join('\n') // å»ç©ºè¡Œå¹¶Trimæ¯ä¸€è¡Œ
        .trim();
    }

    // --- äº¤äº’é€»è¾‘ ---

    // æ‹–æ‹½æ•ˆæœ
    ['dragenter', 'dragover'].forEach(e => els.dropArea.addEventListener(e, (ev) => {
      ev.preventDefault(); els.dropArea.classList.add('drag-active');
    }));
    ['dragleave', 'drop'].forEach(e => els.dropArea.addEventListener(e, (ev) => {
      ev.preventDefault(); els.dropArea.classList.remove('drag-active');
    }));

    // æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†
    const handleFile = (file) => {
      if (!file || !file.type.startsWith('image/')) return alert('è¯·ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶');
      currentFile = file;
      
      const reader = new FileReader();
      reader.onload = (e) => {
        els.previewImg.src = e.target.result;
        els.previewImg.classList.remove('hidden');
        els.clearBtn.classList.remove('hidden');
        els.uploadPrompt.classList.add('hidden');
        
        // æ¿€æ´»æŒ‰é’®
        els.runBtn.disabled = false;
        els.runBtn.className = 'mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 transition-colors shadow-md hover:shadow-lg';
        
        // é‡ç½®ç»“æœåŒº
        els.resultBox.value = '';
        els.copyBtn.disabled = true;
        els.progressBox.classList.add('hidden');
      };
      reader.readAsDataURL(file);
    };

    els.dropArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => handleFile(e.dataTransfer.files[0]));
    els.dropArea.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if(e.target !== els.clearBtn && e.target.parentNode !== els.clearBtn) els.fileInput.click();
    });
    els.fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => handleFile(e.target.files[0]));

    // æ¸…é™¤å›¾ç‰‡
    els.clearBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      e.stopPropagation();
      currentFile = null;
      els.previewImg.classList.add('hidden');
      els.clearBtn.classList.add('hidden');
      els.uploadPrompt.classList.remove('hidden');
      els.runBtn.disabled = true;
      els.runBtn.className = 'mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-slate-300 cursor-not-allowed transition-colors';
      els.fileInput.value = '';
    });

    // æ‰§è¡ŒOCR
    els.runBtn.addEventListener('click', async () => {
      if (!currentFile) return;

      els.progressBox.classList.remove('hidden');
      els.runBtn.disabled = true;
      els.runBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
      
      try {
        const { data: { text } } = await Tesseract.recognize(currentFile, 'chi_sim', {
          logger: m => {
            if (m.status === 'recognizing text') {
              const pct = Math.floor(m.progress * 100) + '%';
              els.progressBar.style.width = pct;
              els.progressText.innerText = pct;
            }
          }
        });

        // å…³é”®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ cleanText å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
        const finalText = cleanText(text);
        
        els.resultBox.value = finalText || 'æœªèƒ½è¯†åˆ«å‡ºæ–‡å­—';
        els.copyBtn.disabled = !finalText;
      } catch (err) {
        els.resultBox.value = 'è¯†åˆ«å‡ºé”™: ' + err.message;
      } finally {
        els.runBtn.disabled = false;
        els.runBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
      }
    });

    // å¤åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½
    els.copyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      els.resultBox.select();
      document.execCommand('copy');
      els.toast.classList.remove('opacity-0');
      setTimeout(() => els.toast.classList.add('opacity-0'), 2000);
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

item.title: å‰ç«¯JSå†…å®¹åŠ å¯†
item.description:
å‰ç«¯å†…å®¹åŠ å¯†ï¼Œå¯†ç 123
<div id="decryptBox">
  <input type="password" id="p" placeholder="å¯†ç " autocomplete="off">
  <button onclick="u()">è§£é”</button>
</div>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/crypto-js@4.2.0/crypto-js.min.js"></script>
<script>
const enc='U2FsdGVkX1/oFhOAnfWf+QoLoDjdZHY7aJMbyGhbSIFfoIj58RdEv+7x2nWFhja1Z5c+D0ZXsITeuA1UEbm728+rLtWhIPDpTa1kCRuJmko=';
function u(){
  try{
    const d=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(enc,p.value).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);

}

item.description:
import fitz  # PyMuPDFåº“
import os

def pdf_to_high_res_jpg(pdf_path, output_folder, dpi=600):
    """
    å°†PDFæ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¯ä¸€é¡µè½¬æ¢ä¸ºé«˜åˆ†è¾¨ç‡JPGå›¾ç‰‡
    
    å‚æ•°:
        pdf_path (str): PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        output_folder (str): è¾“å‡ºå›¾ç‰‡çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
        dpi (int): å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†è¾¨ç‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º600
    """
    # åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼ˆå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
    os.makedirs(output_folder, exist_ok=True)
    
    try:
        # æ‰“å¼€PDFæ–‡ä»¶
        pdf_document = fitz.open(pdf_path)
        print(f"æˆåŠŸæ‰“å¼€PDFæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…±{len(pdf_document)}é¡µ")
        
        # éå†æ¯ä¸€é¡µ
        for page_number in range(len(pdf_document)):
            # è·å–å½“å‰é¡µ
            page = pdf_document[page_number]
            
            # è®¾ç½®ç¼©æ”¾å› å­ï¼Œ72DPIæ˜¯é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼Œè¦å¾—åˆ°600DPIéœ€è¦ç¼©æ”¾600/72å€
            zoom = dpi / 72
            mat = fitz.Matrix(zoom, zoom)
            
            # å°†é¡µé¢è½¬æ¢ä¸ºåƒç´ å›¾
            pix = page.get_pixmap(matrix=mat)
            
            # ç”Ÿæˆè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶åï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼špage_001.jpgï¼‰
            output_filename = f"page_{page_number + 1:03d}.jpg"
            output_path = os.path.join(output_folder, output_filename)
            
            # ä¿å­˜ä¸ºJPG
            pix.save(output_path)
            print(f"å·²ä¿å­˜: {output_path}")
        
        # å…³é—­PDFæ–‡ä»¶
        pdf_document.close()
        print("è½¬æ¢å®Œæˆï¼")
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"è½¬æ¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
if __name__ == "__main__":
    # è¾“å…¥PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
    input_pdf =     pdf_file_path = "First Aid Cases For The USMLE Step 1 (Tao Le, Richard Giovane) (Z-Library).pdf"  # æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä½ çš„PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„

    # è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹è·¯å¾„
    output_dir = "pdf_pages_jpg"
    
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸º600DPIçš„JPG
    pdf_to_high_res_jpg(input_pdf, output_dir, dpi=600)

On Error Resume Next
MsgBox "Start converting PPT and Word files into PDF format. Please ensure Office or WPS is installed. Please wait...", vbInformation, "Conversion Start"

Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17
Dim oWord, ppt, fso, isOffice, isWPS

' åˆå§‹åŒ–å˜é‡
Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
isOffice = False
isWPS = False

Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("KWPS.Application")
Set ppt = CreateObject("KWPP.application")
If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then
    isOffice = True
Else
    If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit
    If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit
    Set oWord = Nothing
    Set ppt = Nothing
    
    Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("Word.Application")
    Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.application")
    If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then
        isWPS = True
    Else
        ' ä¸¤ç§åŠå…¬è½¯ä»¶éƒ½æœªå®‰è£…
        If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit
        If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit
        Set oWord = Nothing
        Set ppt = Nothing
        Set fso = Nothing
        MsgBox "Failed to find Office or WPS. Please install one of them first.", vbCritical, "Error"
        WScript.Quit
    End If
End If

' å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
ProcessFolder fso.GetFolder(".")

' æ¸…ç†å¯¹è±¡
If IsObject(oWord) Then
    oWord.Quit
    Set oWord = Nothing
End If
If IsObject(ppt) Then
    ppt.Quit
    Set ppt = Nothing
End If
Set fso = Nothing

MsgBox "PPT and Word files have been successfully converted into PDF format!", vbInformation, "Conversion Complete"

Sub ProcessFolder(folder)
    Dim ff, subFolder, pdfPath
    
    For Each ff In folder.Files
        ' å¤„ç†Wordæ–‡ä»¶ (.doc, .docx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
        If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".doc" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".docx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
            pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf"
            Set oDoc = oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path)
            oDoc.ExportAsFixedFormat pdfPath, wdExportFormatPDF
            oDoc.Close
            Set oDoc = Nothing
        End If
        
        ' å¤„ç†PowerPointæ–‡ä»¶ (.ppt, .pptx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
        If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".pptx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
            pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf"
            Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path, False, False, False)
            pptfile.SaveAs pdfPath, 32, False
            pptfile.Close
            Set pptfile = Nothing
        End If
    Next
    
    ' é€’å½’å¤„ç†å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
    For Each subFolder In folder.SubFolders
        ProcessFolder subFolder
    Next
End Sub

WPS ( ppt wordå¿«é€Ÿè½¬æ¢PDF-WPS.vbs )

åˆå¹¶ ï¼ˆppt wordå¿«é€Ÿè½¬æ¢PDF-åˆå¹¶.vbsï¼‰

On Error Resume Next
MsgBox "å¼€å§‹è½¬æ¢PPTå’ŒWordæ–‡ä»¶ä¸ºPDFæ ¼å¼ï¼Œè¯·ç¨å€™..."
Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17
Dim oWord, ppt, isWPS, isOffice

' å°è¯•åˆ›å»ºWPSå¯¹è±¡
Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("KWPS.Application")
Set ppt = CreateObject("KWPP.Application")

' æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯WPSç¯å¢ƒ
If Not oWord Is Nothing And Not ppt Is Nothing Then
    isWPS = True
Else
    ' å°è¯•åˆ›å»ºOfficeå¯¹è±¡
    Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("Word.Application")
    Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.Application")
    If Not oWord Is Nothing And Not ppt Is Nothing Then

    Else
        MsgBox "æœªæ£€æµ‹åˆ°WPSæˆ–Officeï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿å·²å®‰è£…å…¶ä¸­ä¸€æ¬¾åŠå…¬è½¯ä»¶ï¼"
        WScript.Quit

End If

Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")

Set ffs = fds.Files

For Each ff In ffs
    ' å¤„ç†Wordæ–‡ä»¶
    If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".doc" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = "docx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
        Set oDoc = oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path)
        oDoc.ExportAsFixedFormat Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf", wdExportFormatPDF
        oDoc.Close

    End If
    
    ' å¤„ç†PPTæ–‡ä»¶
    If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = "pptx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
        Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path, False, False, False)
        pptfile.SaveAs Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf", 32, False
        pptfile.Close
        Set pptfile = Nothing
    End If
Next

' æ¸…ç†å¯¹è±¡
If Not oWord Is Nothing Then

    Set oWord = Nothing
End If
If Not ppt Is Nothing Then
    ppt.Quit
    Set ppt = Nothing

item.description:

import pubchempy as pcp
from pymol import cmd
import os
def download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file):
    try:
        # å°è¯•æ ¹æ®æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦è·å–åŒ–åˆç‰©
        if isinstance(compound_identifier, int):
            compound = pcp.Compound.from_cid(compound_identifier)
        else:
            results = pcp.get_compounds(compound_identifier, 'name')
            if results:
                compound = results[0]
            else:
                print(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸ {compound_identifier} åŒ¹é…çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©ã€‚")
                return

        # ä¸‹è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶
        sdf_content = compound.canonical_smiles
        sdf = pcp.get_sdf(compound.cid)
        with open(output_file, 'w') as file:
            file.write(sdf)
        print(f"SDF æ–‡ä»¶å·²æˆåŠŸä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"ä¸‹è½½è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯: {e}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    # è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä½ æƒ³è¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©åç§°æˆ– CID
    compound_identifier = "aspirin"
    output_file = compound_identifier + ".sdf"
    download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file)
    # ä½¿ç”¨ PyMOL åŠ è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶è¿›è¡Œåç»­å¤„ç†
    cmd.load(output_file)
    # ä¿å­˜ä¸º PDB æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
    cmd.save(compound_identifier + ".pdb", state=0)
    cmd.quit()
    # åˆ é™¤ä¸´æ—¶ SDF æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
    #os.remove(output_file)

    await page.locator("#div20").get_by_role("link").first.click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div21 > .ui-controlgroup > div:nth-child(2) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div21 > .ui-controlgroup > div:nth-child(4) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").click()
    await page.get_by_text("æäº¤").click()
    await page.wait_for_function("window.location.href !== 'https://www.wjx.cn/vm/Q0x3Wuq.aspx'")
    await page.wait_for_timeout(3000)
    await page.close()
    await context.close()

async def main() -> None:
    async with async_playwright() as p:
        browser = await  p.chromium.launch(headless=True)
        tasks = []
        for i in range(6):
            tasks.append(run(browser))
        titles=await asyncio.gather(*tasks)
        for title in titles:  
            print(title) 
        await browser.close()
        
if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())

item.description:
ä»£ç†ä½¿ç”¨8089ç«¯å£ï¼Œé€‚é…clash
ä½¿ç”¨ï¼šåŒç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºpaper.txtï¼Œä¸€è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªå¡«å†™ä¸€ä¸ªPMID
ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªcitation.nbibæ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡ä»¶


# %%
###é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå…ˆæŠŠæ–‡ç« å…¨éƒ¨å¤åˆ¶åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªpaper.txtæ–‡æœ¬ä¸­
###å…ˆè·å–æ‰€æœ‰PMID: åé¢çš„æ•°å­—
import re
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

proxies = {"http": "http://127.0.0.1:8089"}

pm=pd.read_csv('paper.txt',header=None)
# to list
pm=pm[0].tolist()


# %%
import requests
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor

def fetch_pmid(pmid):
    max_retries = 300  # è®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
    for attempt in range(max_retries):
        url = 'https://api.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/lit/ctxp/v1/pubmed/?format=medline&id={}'.format(pmid)
        print(url)
        print("-------requests start--------------")
        res = requests.get(url,proxies=proxies)
        print("-------requests end--------------")
        print(res)
        if res.status_code == 200:
            res.close()
            return res.text + "\n"

        else:
            print(f"Request failed, retrying... (attempt {attempt + 1}/{max_retries})")
    
    print(f"Failed to fetch PMID {pmid} after {max_retries} attempts.")
    return ""

cita = []

# è®¾ç½®çº¿ç¨‹æ•°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè®¾ç½®ä¸º4ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´
num_threads = 32

with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=num_threads) as executor:
    # ä½¿ç”¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªpmid
    results = list(executor.map(fetch_pmid, pm))

cita.extend(results)

# æ›¿æ¢å¤„ç†

# %%
cita = [y.replace("\r", "") for y in cita]
cita = [y + "\n" for y in cita]
f=open("citation.nbib","w",encoding='utf-8')
f.writelines(cita)
f.close()

item.title: playwrightè‡ªåŠ¨ç™»å½•STU WebVPN
item.description:
import re
from playwright.sync_api import Playwright, sync_playwright, expect
import time
import os

import hmac
import hashlib

def totp(key, t, digits=6):
    step = 30
    t = int(t / step)
    key = key.encode()
    counter = t.to_bytes(8, 'big')
    h = hmac.new(key, counter, hashlib.sha1).digest()
    offset = h[-1] & 0x0f
    truncated = h[offset:offset + 4]
    code = int.from_bytes(truncated, 'big') & 0x7fffffff
    code = str(code % 10 ** digits).zfill(digits)
    return code

# %%


def run(playwright: Playwright) -> None:
    browser = playwright.chromium.launch(headless=True)
    context = browser.new_context()
    page = context.new_page()
    page.goto("https://webvpn.stu.edu.cn/portal/#!/login")
    page.locator("#Calc input[type=\"text\"]").fill("æ ¡å›­ç½‘è´¦å·")
    page.locator("#loginPwd").click()
    page.locator("#loginPwd").fill("æ ¡å›­ç½‘å¯†ç ")
    page.locator("span").filter(has_text="æˆ‘å·²é˜…è¯»å¹¶åŒæ„").locator("div").first.click()
    page.get_by_role("button", name="ç™»å½•").click()
    page.locator("#app_dialog_container").get_by_role("textbox").fill(str(totp("å¡«å†™ä½ çš„TOTPå¯†é’¥", time.time())))
    page.get_by_role("button", name="ç¡®å®š").click()
    # ---------------------
    # è·å–cookieå€¼
    cookies = page.context.cookies()
    for cookie in cookies:
        print(f"{cookie['name']}: {cookie['value']}")
        if cookie['name'] == "TWFID":
            TWFID = cookie['value']
    
    
    url="https://webvpn.stu.edu.cn/portal/shortcut.html?twfid="+TWFID+"&url=http://bilibili-com-s.webvpn.stu.edu.cn%3A8118"
    os.system('start msedge "'+url+'"')
    # ---------------------
    context.close()
    browser.close()


with sync_playwright() as playwright:
    run(playwright)

item.description:
import os
import ecdsa

# ç”Ÿæˆç§é’¥å’Œå…¬é’¥
def generate_keys():
    # ä½¿ç”¨secp256k1æ›²çº¿ç”Ÿæˆå¯†é’¥å¯¹
    sk = ecdsa.SigningKey.generate(curve=ecdsa.SECP256k1)
    vk = sk.get_verifying_key()
    return sk, vk

# å¯¹æ¶ˆæ¯è¿›è¡Œç­¾å
def sign_message(private_key, message):
    return private_key.sign(message)

# éªŒè¯ç­¾å
def verify_signature(public_key, message, signature):
    return public_key.verify(signature, message)

# %%
private_key, public_key = generate_keys()
# ç®€å•æ¶ˆæ¯
message = b"Hello, ECDSA!"

# ç­¾åæ¶ˆæ¯
signature = sign_message(private_key, message)
print(f"Signature: {signature.hex()}")

item.title: æ±•å¤´å¤§å­¦SSO å•ç‚¹ç™»å½•æ¥å…¥å®ä¾‹
item.description:
Single Sign On System

import os
url="https://sso.stu.edu.cn/login?service=http://localhost:8080"
os.system('start msedge "'+url+'"')

import http.server
import socketserver
import urllib.parse
import threading
import requests
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# å®šä¹‰å…¨å±€å˜é‡å­˜å‚¨ticket
ticket = None
username = None
# è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†ç±»
class MyHandler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler):
    def log_message(self, format, *args):
        pass  # é‡å†™æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸æ‰§è¡Œä»»ä½•æ“ä½œ

    def do_GET(self):
        global ticket, httpd, username
        # è§£æè¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„çš„å‚æ•°
        parsed_path = urllib.parse.urlparse(self.path)
        query_params = urllib.parse.parse_qs(parsed_path.query)
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ticketå‚æ•°
        if 'ticket' in query_params:
            ticket = query_params['ticket'][0]
        
        # å‘é€å“åº”
        self.send_response(200)
        self.end_headers()
        self.wfile.write(b"Ticket received...")
        vurl="https://sso.stu.edu.cn/serviceValidate?service=http://localhost:8080&ticket="+ticket
        headers={'Connection':'close'}
        requests.adapters.DEFAULT_RETRIES = 5
        response = requests.get(vurl, headers=headers, verify=False)
        root = ET.fromstring(response.text)
        if root[0].tag.endswith('authenticationSuccess'):
            print('Login success, you can close the browser now ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥å…³é—­æµè§ˆå™¨äº†')
            print('username:', root[0][0].text)
            username = root[0][0].text
            response.close()
            threading.Thread(target=httpd.shutdown).start()
        else:
            print('Login failed, please try again ç™»é™†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•')
            print('error:', root[0][0].text)
        # å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨
# å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨
def run_server():
    global httpd
    port = 8080
    handler = MyHandler
    with socketserver.TCPServer(("", port), handler) as httpd:
        print(f"Verifying login at https://sso.stu.edu.cn/login?service=http://localhost:8080")
        httpd.serve_forever()
run_server()


Users =['ç”¨æˆ·å']

if username in Users:
    print('Login success, welcome to use this script ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬è„šæœ¬')
else:
    print('No permission to use this script æ²¡æœ‰æƒé™ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬è„šæœ¬')
    os.system('pause')
    exit()

item.description:

On Error Resume Next
    Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17
    Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("Word.Application")
	Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.application")
    Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
    Set fds=fso.GetFolder(".")
    Set ffs=fds.Files
	
    For Each ff In ffs
    If (LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))=".doc" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))="docx" ) And Left(ff.Name,1)<>"~" Then
        Set oDoc=oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path)
        odoc.ExportAsFixedFormat Left(ff.Path,InStrRev(ff.Path,"."))&"pdf",wdExportFormatPDF
    End If
	If (LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))=".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))="pptx" ) And Left(ff.Name,1)<>"~" Then
Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path,false,false,false)
pptfile.Saveas Left(ff.Path,InStrRev(ff.Path,"."))&"pdf",32,false
End If
    Next
    odoc.Close
    oword.Quit
	pptfiles.Close
	ppt.Quit
    Set oDoc=Nothing
    Set oWord =Nothing
	Set pptfile = Nothing
	Set ppt = Nothing
	MsgBox "PPTå’ŒWordå…¨éƒ¨è½¬æ¢ä¸ºPDFå•¦!"

item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int d[500000*4],n,m=1;


inline void build(int n){
	while(m<=n)m<<=1;
    for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++) cin>>d[i];
    for(int i=m-1;i;--i) d[i]=d[i<<1]+d[i<<1|1]; 
}  

void chg(int x,int v){
    d[x=m+x]+=v;
    while(x) d[x>>=1]=d[x<<1]+d[x<<1|1];
}  

int add(int x,int v){
	for(int i=x+m;i;i>>=1)d[i]+=v;
}
int ask(int l,int r){
int ans=0;
for(l=m+l-1,r=m+r+1 ; l^r^1 ; l>>=1,r>>=1){
	if(~l&1)ans+=d[l^1];
if(r&1)ans+=d[r^1];
}
return ans;
}
void debug(){
	for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++)cout<<d[i]<<" ";
	cout<<m<<endl;
	
}
int main(){
int q;
cin>>n>>q;
build(n);
while(q--){
	int op,a,b;
	cin>>op>>a>>b;
	if(op==1)add(a,b);
	else cout<<ask(a,b)<<endl;
}


}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int f[2000010][24],n;
int get(int x,int y){
	int k=log(y-x+1)/log(2);
	return max(f[x][k],f[y-(1<<k)+1][k]);
}
int main(){
	int i,j,m,t,k;
	scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	scanf("%d",&f[i][0]);
	int x=log(n)/log(2)+1;
	for(int j=1;j<x;j++)
	for(int i=1;i<=n-(1<<j)+1;i++)
	f[i][j]=max(f[i][j-1],f[i+(1<<(j-1))][j-1]);
	while(m--){
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		printf("%d\n",get(a,b));
		
		
	}

}

const long long   N=100010,M=200011;

	ver[++tot]=y;edge[tot]=z;Next[tot]=head[x];
	head[x]=tot;
}

while(m--){

add(a,b,c);

}

memset(v,0,sizeof(v));

v[s]=1;

while(q.size())
{
	long long   x=q.front();
	q.pop();
	v[x]=0;
	for(long long  i=head[x];i;i=Next[i])
	{long long   y=ver[i],z=edge[i];

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef int ll;

ll d[5010],mp[5010][5010];
bool v[5010];
ll i,j,n,m,t,k;

int main() {
	cin>>n>>m;
	memset(mp,0x3f,sizeof(mp));
	memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d));
	memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
	ll a,b,c;

	for(i=1; i<=m; i++) {
		cin>>a>>b>>c;

		mp[a][b]=min(mp[a][b],c);

		mp[b][a]=mp[a][b];

	}

	d[1]=0;

	for(i=1; i<n; i++) {
		ll x=0;
		for(j=1; j<=n; j++)

			if(!v[j]&&(x==0||d[j]<d[x]))x=j;

		v[x]=1;
		for(j=1; j<=n; j++)

			if(!v[j])d[j]=min(d[j],mp[x][j]);

	}

	ll ans=0;
	for(i=2; i<=n; i++)
		ans+=d[i];
	
	if(ans>99999999)cout<<"orz";
	else cout<<ans;
	
	
}

item.title: Primå †ä¼˜åŒ–ç‰ˆ
item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
priority_queue<pair<long long,long long> >q;
vector<long long>ver[5010],edge[5010];
bool v[5010];
long long d[5010];
long long n,m;
void add(long long x,long long y,long long z){
	ver[x].push_back(y);edge[x].push_back(z);
}
void init(){
	cin>>n>>m;
	for(long long i=1;i<=m;i++){
		long long a,b,c;
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
		add(a,b,c);add(b,a,c);
	}
}

void work(){
	memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d));
	memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
	long long ans=0;
	d[1]=0;
	q.push(make_pair(0,1));
	int cnt=0;
	while(q.size()){
		long long x=q.top().second;
		q.pop();
		if(v[x])continue;
		v[x]=1;
		cnt++;
		for(int i=ver[x].size()-1;i>=0;i--){
		
			int y=ver[x][i],z=edge[x][i];
			if(!v[y] &&(z<d[y])){
				d[y]=z;
				q.push(make_pair(-d[y],y));
			}
		}
		
		
	}
for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)ans+=d[i];
if(cnt==n)cout<<ans;
else cout<<"orz";


}

int main(){
init();
work();

}

item.title: LCAç®—æ³•
item.description:
// luogu-judger-enable-o2
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ver[2*500000],nex[2*500000],head[2*500000],d[2*500000],p[2*500000][23],tot;
void add(int x,int y){
	ver[++tot]=y;nex[tot]=head[x];head[x]=tot;
}
int read(){
	int x=0;
	char ch;
	while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch=getchar();
	while(ch>'0'&&ch<'9'){
		x=x*10+ch-'0';
		ch=getchar();
	}
	return x;
}
void dfs(int x,int fa){
	d[x]=d[fa]+1;
	p[x][0]=fa;
	for(int i=1;(1<<i)<=d[x];i++)
	p[x][i]=p[p[x][i-1]][i-1];
	for(int i=head[x];i;i=nex[i]){
		if(ver[i]!=fa)
		dfs(ver[i],x);	
	}
}
int lca(int a,int b){
	if(d[a]>d[b])swap(a,b);
	for(int i=20;i>=0;i--)
	if(d[a]<=d[b]-(1<<i))
	b=p[b][i];
	if(a==b)
	return a;
	for(int i=20;i>=0;i--)
	if(p[a][i]==p[b][i])continue;
	else a=p[a][i],b=p[b][i];
	
	return p[a][0];
}
int main(){
	int i,j,n,m,t,k,s;
	scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&m,&s);
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		add(a,b);
		add(b,a);
	}
	dfs(s,0);
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		int a,b;
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		cout<<lca(a,b)<<endl;
	}
}

item.title: çº¿æ®µæ ‘
item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct pl{
	long long l,r,v,add,tim;
	#define l(x) tree[x].l
	#define r(x) tree[x].r
	#define v(x) tree[x].v
	#define add(x) tree[x].add
}tree[4*100000];
long long a[100001];
void build(long long p,long long l,long long r){
	l(p)=l;r(p)=r;
	if(l==r){
		v(p)=a[l];return;
	}
	long long mid=(l+r)>>1;
	build(p<<1,l,mid);
	build((p<<1)+1,mid+1,r);
	v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1);
}
void spread(long long p){
	if(add(p)==0)return;
	v(p*2)+=add(p)*(r(p*2)-l(p*2)+1);
	v(p*2+1)+=add(p)*(r(p*2+1)-l(p*2+1)+1);
	add(p*2)+=add(p);
	add(p*2+1)+=add(p);
	add(p)=0;
}
void chg(long long p,long long l,long long r,long long d){
	if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p)){
		v(p)+=d*(r(p)-l(p)+1);
		add(p)+=d;
		return;
	}
	spread(p);
	long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1;
	if(l<=mid)chg(p*2,l,r,d);
	if(r>mid)chg(p*2+1,l,r,d);
	v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1);
}
long long ask(long long p,long long l,long long r){
	if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p))return v(p);
	spread(p);
	long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1;
	long long ans=0;
	if(l<=mid)ans+=ask(p*2,l,r);
	if(r>mid)ans+=ask(p*2+1,l,r);
	return ans;
}
int main(){
long long i,j,n,m,t,k;
cin>>n>>m;
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)cin>>a[i];
build(1,1,n);
while(m--){
	long long op,l,r,k;
	cin>>op>>l>>r;
	if(op==1){
		cin>>k;
		chg(1,l,r,k);
	}else cout<<ask(1,l,r)<<endl;	
}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long d[500000<<2],laz[500000<<2],n,m=1;;
void build(){
	while(m<=n)m<<=1;
	for(long long i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++)cin>>d[i];
	for(long long i=m-1;i>=1;i--)d[i]=d[i<<1]+d[i<<1|1];
}
long long get(long long x,long long y){
	long long ans=0,lc=0,rc=0,cnt=1;//cnt=1
	for(x+=m-1,y+=m+1; x^y^1; x>>=1,y>>=1,cnt<<=1){
		if(laz[x])ans+=laz[x]*lc;
		if(laz[y])ans+=laz[y]*rc;
		if(~x&1)ans+=d[x^1],lc+=cnt;
		if(y&1)ans+=d[y^1],rc+=cnt;
	}
	
		for(;x;x>>=1,y>>=1)ans+=laz[x]*lc,ans+=laz[y]*rc;
	return ans;
}
void add(long long x,long long y,long long v){
	long long ans=0,lc=0,rc=0,cnt=1;//cnt=1
	for(x+=m-1,y+=m+1; x^y^1; x>>=1,y>>=1,cnt<<=1){
		d[x]+=v*lc;d[y]+=v*rc;
		if(~x&1) laz[x^1]+=v,d[x^1]+=v*cnt,lc+=cnt;
		if(y&1)  laz[y^1]+=v,d[y^1]+=v*cnt,rc+=cnt;		

	}
for(;x;x>>=1,y>>=1)d[x]+=v*lc,d[y]+=v*rc;
}
int main(){
long long q;
cin>>n>>q;
build();
while(q--){
	long long a,b,op,c;
	cin>>op>>a>>b;
	if(op==1){
		cin>>c;
		add(a,b,c);
	}else{
		
		cout<<get(a,b)<<endl;
		
	}
	
	
}




}

è¿™é‡Œèƒ½å¤Ÿç”Ÿæˆ100000ä¸ªæ ·æœ¬ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ ·æœ¬æœ‰3ä¸ªç‰¹å¾ï¼Œ4ä¸ªç±»åˆ«ï¼Œ3ä¸ªç‰¹å¾æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆç‰¹å¾ï¼Œ0ä¸ªå†—ä½™ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œéšæœºç§å­ä¸º50ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç±»åˆ«æœ‰1ä¸ªç°‡ã€‚ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å°†æ•°æ®é›†åˆ†ä¸ºè®­ç»ƒé›†å’Œæµ‹è¯•é›†ï¼Œæµ‹è¯•é›†å 10%.
ç”±äºæ¯ä¸ªæ ·æœ¬éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª3ç»´å‘é‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å°†æ•°æ®å–å‰2ç»´æ•°æ®å°†æ•°æ®é›†å¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

è¯„ä¼°å‡½æ•°

æˆ‘ä»¬é‡‡ç”¨å‡†ç¡®ç‡(Accuracy)ã€ç²¾ç¡®ç‡(Precision)ã€å¬å›ç‡(Recall)ã€F1å€¼(F1-score)ã€R2å€¼(R2-score)ï¼Œè¿™5ä¸ªæŒ‡æ ‡æ¥è¯„ä¼°æ¨¡å‹çš„æ€§èƒ½ã€‚

å‡†ç¡®ç‡(Accuracy)

å‡†ç¡®ç‡æ˜¯æŒ‡åˆ†ç±»æ­£ç¡®çš„æ ·æœ¬æ•°å æ€»æ ·æœ¬æ•°çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼Œå³ï¼š

$Accuracy = \frac{TP+TN}{TP+TN+FP+FN}$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒTPæ˜¯çœŸæ­£ä¾‹ï¼ŒTNæ˜¯çœŸè´Ÿä¾‹ï¼ŒFPæ˜¯å‡æ­£ä¾‹ï¼ŒFNæ˜¯å‡è´Ÿä¾‹ã€‚

ç²¾ç¡®ç‡(Precision)

ç²¾ç¡®ç‡æ˜¯æŒ‡åˆ†ç±»æ­£ç¡®çš„æ­£ä¾‹æ•°å åˆ†ç±»ä¸ºæ­£ä¾‹çš„æ ·æœ¬æ•°çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼Œå³ï¼š

$$ Precision = \frac{TP}{TP+FP} $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒTPæ˜¯çœŸæ­£ä¾‹ï¼ŒFPæ˜¯å‡æ­£ä¾‹ã€‚

å¬å›ç‡(Recall)

å¬å›ç‡æ˜¯æŒ‡åˆ†ç±»æ­£ç¡®çš„æ­£ä¾‹æ•°å çœŸæ­£ä¾‹çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼Œå³ï¼š

å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒTPæ˜¯çœŸæ­£ä¾‹ï¼ŒFNæ˜¯å‡è´Ÿä¾‹ã€‚

F1å€¼æ˜¯ç²¾ç¡®ç‡å’Œå¬å›ç‡çš„è°ƒå’Œå¹³å‡æ•°ï¼Œå³ï¼š

$$ F1 = \frac{2*Precision*Recall}{Precision+Recall} $$

F1å€¼è¶Šæ¥è¿‘1ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜æ¨¡å‹çš„æ€§èƒ½è¶Šå¥½ã€‚

R2å€¼(R2-score)

$$ R2 = 1-\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n}(y_i-\hat{y_i})^2}{\sum_{i=1}^{n}(y_i-\bar{y})^2} $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ$y_i$æ˜¯çœŸå®å€¼ï¼Œ$\hat{y_i}$æ˜¯é¢„æµ‹å€¼ï¼Œ$\bar{y}$æ˜¯çœŸå®å€¼çš„å‡å€¼ã€‚

R2å€¼è¶Šæ¥è¿‘1ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜æ¨¡å‹çš„æ€§èƒ½è¶Šå¥½ã€‚

ï¼ˆ5.1ï¼Œ3.5ï¼Œ1.4ï¼Œ0.2ï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆ4.9ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ1.4ï¼Œ0.2ï¼‰

class Net(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Net, self).__init__()
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(2, 40)
        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(40, 40)
        self.fc3 =nn.Linear(40, 24)
        self.fc4 =nn.Linear(24, 1)
    def forward(self,x):
        return self.fc4(t.relu(self.fc3(t.relu(self.fc2(t.relu(self.fc1(x)))))))

def train(epoch,model,opt,lossfn,tu,tc):
    for i in range(1,epoch+1):
        tp=model(tu)
        loss=lossfn(tp,tc)
        opt.zero_grad()
        loss.backward()
        opt.step()
        if i % 10 == 0 or i == 1:
            print('Epoch %d, Loss %f' % (i, float(loss)))
    return model
def f(x,x2):
    return x**2+x2

import torch as t
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.optim as optim

def training_loop(n_epochs, optimizer, model,loss_fn, t_u, t_c):
    for epoch in range(1, n_epochs + 1):
        t_p = model(t_u)          #è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ¨¡å‹çš„é¢„æµ‹å€¼
        loss = loss_fn(t_p, t_c)  #è®¡ç®—æŸå¤±å‡½æ•°
        optimizer.zero_grad()   
        loss.backward()   #å›æº¯ç´¯è®¡æŸå¤±
        optimizer.step()
        if epoch % 50 == 0:
            print('Epoch %d, Loss %f' % (epoch, float(loss)))
    return model


epoches=30000  #è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•° ä¸€èˆ¬æ¬¡æ•°é€‚ä¸­ï¼Œä¸ºé˜²æ­¢è¿‡åº¦æ‹Ÿåˆä¸å»ºè®®è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°è¿‡å¤š
num=50000  #éšæœºç”Ÿæˆçš„æ ·æœ¬æ•° ä¸€èˆ¬è¶Šå¤šè¶Šå¥½ï¼Œçœ‹è¿è¡Œé…ç½®

learning_rate=1e-4   #å­¦ä¹ ç‡ï¼ˆæ•°å€¼è¶Šå¤§å­¦å¾—è¶Šå¿«ï¼ˆä½†ä¸ä¸€å®šå‡†ç¡®ï¼‰ï¼Œæ•°å€¼è¶Šå°æ‹Ÿåˆè¶Šå¥½ï¼ˆæ—¶é—´è¾ƒé•¿ï¼‰ï¼‰å»ºè®®å– 1e-2 ã€1e-3ã€1e-4ã€1e-5

x = t.randn(num, 1)
def f(x):
    return 30 * x + 10
    #å¾…æ‹Ÿåˆçš„å¼å­ä¸º y=30*x +10  å¯è‡ªè¡Œä¿®æ”¹if you likeã€‚


y = f(x)+ t.randn(num, 1)*10  #  åé¢çš„ t.randn(num, 1)*10 æ˜¯åç¦»å€¼ï¼Œé™ä½è®­ç»ƒçš„ç²¾ç¡®æ€§ï¼ˆç»™ä½ çš„æ¨¡å‹æ›´å¤šçš„æŒ‘æˆ˜ï¼‰
linear_model = nn.Linear(1, 1)
optimizer = optim.SGD(linear_model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)
training_loop(n_epochs=epoches,optimizer=optimizer,model=linear_model,loss_fn=nn.MSELoss(),t_u=x,t_c=y)
print('\n')
#print(linear_model.weight)
#print(linear_model.bias)

while(1):
    x=float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥æƒ³é¢„æµ‹çš„xå€¼ï¼š'))
    tmp=float(linear_model(t.tensor([x]))[0])
    print("æ‹Ÿåˆå€¼:",tmp)
    print("çœŸå®å€¼:",f(x))
    print("ç›¸å¯¹è¯¯å·®:",1-tmp/f(x))
    print('\n')

è¿™ä¸ªç¨‹åºå¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†(ç”Ÿæˆè®­ç»ƒæ•°æ®ã€æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å‹)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ç”Ÿæˆè®­ç»ƒæ•°æ®éƒ¨åˆ†å¯æœ‰å¯æ— (å› ä¸ºåœ¨å®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ•°æ®ä¸ºäººå·¥å¯¼å…¥ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿéšæœºç”Ÿæˆ)ã€‚

item.title: pythonä»£ç†
item.description:
#!/usr/bin/env python
#coding:utf-8
import socket
import sys
import re
import os
import time
import select
import threading

HEADER_SIZE = 4096

host = '0.0.0.0'
port = 8000

#å­è¿›ç¨‹è¿›è¡Œsocket ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚
def http_socket(client, addr):
    #åˆ›å»º select æ£€æµ‹ fd åˆ—è¡¨
    inputs  = [client]
    outputs = []
    remote_socket = 0
    print("client connent:{0}:{1}".format(addr[0], addr[1]))
    while True:
        readable, writable, exceptional = select.select(inputs, outputs, inputs)
        try:
            for s in readable:
            	if s is client:
                	#è¯»å– http è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
                	request_header = s.recv(HEADER_SIZE)
                	if remote_socket is 0:
                    	#æ‹†åˆ†å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
                    	host_addr = request_header.split("\r\n")[1].split(":")
                    	#å¦‚æœæœªæŒ‡å®šç«¯å£åˆ™ä¸ºé»˜è®¤ 80
                    	if 2 == len(host_addr):
                        	host_addr.append("80")
                    	name, host, port = map(lambda x: x.strip(), host_addr)
                    	#å»ºç«‹ socket tcp è¿æ¥
                    	sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
                    	sock.connect((host, int(port)))
                    	remote_socket = sock
                    	inputs.append(sock)
                	#å‘é€åŸå§‹è¯·æ±‚å¤´
                	remote_socket.sendall(request_header)
            	else:
                	#æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®å¹¶å‘é€ç»™æµè§ˆå™¨
                	while(True):
                    	resp = s.recv(512)
                    	if resp:
                        	client.sendall(resp)
                		else:
                    		break
    	except Exception as e:
        	print("http socket error {0}".format(e))

#åˆ›å»ºsocketå¯¹è±¡
http_server = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
try:
	http_server.bind((host, port))
except:
	sys.exit("python proxy bind error ")

print("python proxy start")

http_server.listen(1024)

while True:
	client, addr = http_server.accept()
	http_thread = threading.Thread(target=http_socket, args=(client, addr))
	http_thread.start()
	time.sleep(1)

#å…³é—­æ‰€æœ‰è¿æ¥
http_server.close()
print("python proxy close")

import scrapy
from FG1.items import Fg1Item

class FgSpider(scrapy.Spider):
	name = "FG"
	allowed_domains = ["fitgirl-repacks.site"]
	start_urls = ["http://fitgirl-repacks.site/"]

	def parse(self, response):
    	for i in range(1,350):
       		yield scrapy.Request("https://fitgirl-repacks.site/page/"+str(i)+'/',callback=self.parse_page)
    	pass
	def parse_page(self, response):

        	item=Fg1Item()
        	item['tle']=each.xpath("header/h1/a/text()").extract()
        	item['info']=each.xpath("div/ul[1]").extract()
        	yield item
